        public static void throwHttpResponseException(retrofit2.Response response)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Throws an HttpException with the code and error body from a Response.
        Parameters:
        response - response from a backend call
        Throws:
        HttpException - always unless error reading response body
        java.io.IOException - on error reading response body

      • checkResponseAndThrow

        public static void checkResponseAndThrow(retrofit2.Response response)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Checks status of backend responses. Throws a HttpException if response isn't in 200 range.
        Parameters:
        response - response from a backend call
        Throws:
        HttpException - on response code not in 200 range
        java.io.IOException - on error reading response body

        Creates and validates a new File for writing.
        Parameters:
        pathname - path to file
        Returns:
        file pointing to pathname
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if path isn't usable
        java.io.IOException - if a file can't be created

        Parameters:
        pathname - path to file
        Returns:
        file pointing to pathname
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if path doesn't exist or isn't usable
